name: A Wish for Wings -- The Valkyrie's Tale
name_original: A Wish for Wings -- The Valkyrie's Tale
description:
Angels. Demons. Vast Wars about Good versus evil that are not quite what they seem to be.  It is hard for me to describe Jenn Dolari's A Wish for Wings Universe and she does a much better job than I do on her website, dolari.org/awfw.

This game takes place  in the same universe but is a side-story that follows the tale of Gretchen, a  young woman taking up to Vahalla and who gets caught up in a quest.

I will be giving 10% to Ich.io as usual to help them keep the platform up.

I will be giving 40% to the Trans Lifline

And the rest, if people choose to donate, will be given to the creator of the A Wish for Wings web comic, Jenn Dolari. Go check her comic out at dolari.org/awfw
